description: ***Swipe Forward in the gesture area to advance the cards.*** Tongue Twisters are fun to say by yourself or with friends. Try saying "Mixed Biscuits" ten times fast. Now that is hilarious. This app shows you a random twister for you to say. Pass it around a party group for some good times. Downloading this app is easier than saying "The Duluth police dismisseth us." Be careful though, some of the tongue twisters are a little sexy if you say them wrong. Peter Piper, eat your heart out. I have not picked a pickled pepper since.
